intake.trainingGoal: Build raw strength, increase powerlifting total, maintain athleticism
intake.additionalInfo: Former D1 college football linebacker. Played 4 years, graduated 2014. Got away from serious lifting for a few years - desk job, life happened. Ready to get back to being strong. Joined a powerlifting-focused gym with competition equipment. Running 5/3/1 because it's proven and I know how to grind. Goal: hit my old college numbers - 405 squat, 315 bench, 495 deadlift, 205 OHP. Currently rebuilding that base.

programs.name: 5/3/1 Strength Builder
programs.description: Jim Wendler's 5/3/1 program for building raw strength. 4-day split with each day focused on one main lift (Squat, Bench, Deadlift, OHP). Progressive overload through calculated percentages with First Set Last (FSL) for additional volume.

workoutPlan.phaseExplanation: Classic 5/3/1 programming with 3-week waves: Week 1 (5s), Week 2 (3s), Week 3 (5/3/1). Deload every 4th week. Each day focuses on one main lift with assistance work.

workouts.name: Squat Day
workouts.warmup: 10 min bike, leg swings, bodyweight squats, empty bar squats, progressive warmup sets
workouts.cooldown: Hip flexor stretch, quad stretch, foam roll legs

exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.notes: 5/3/1 main work - Week 1: 5/5/5+, Week 2: 3/3/3+, Week 3: 5/3/1+. AMRAP on last set.

exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.notes: FSL (First Set Last) - 5x5 at first working set weight

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.notes: Posterior chain assistance - moderate weight, feel the stretch

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.notes: Quad volume - full ROM

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.notes: Core work - control the movement

workouts.name: Bench Day
workouts.warmup: 5 min cardio, arm circles, band pull aparts, empty bar bench, progressive warmup sets
workouts.cooldown: Chest stretch, shoulder stretch, tricep stretch

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.notes: 5/3/1 main work - Week 1: 5/5/5+, Week 2: 3/3/3+, Week 3: 5/3/1+. AMRAP on last set.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.notes: FSL (First Set Last) - 5x5 at first working set weight

exercises.name: Dumbbell Row
exercises.notes: Back assistance - balance push with pull

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.notes: Tricep/chest assistance - add weight when bodyweight feels easy

exercises.name: Face Pull
exercises.notes: Rear delt and shoulder health - light weight, high reps

workouts.name: Deadlift Day
workouts.warmup: 10 min bike, hip hinges, RDL with empty bar, progressive warmup sets
workouts.cooldown: Hamstring stretch, back stretch, hip flexor stretch

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.notes: 5/3/1 main work - Week 1: 5/5/5+, Week 2: 3/3/3+, Week 3: 5/3/1+. AMRAP on last set.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.notes: FSL (First Set Last) - 5x5 at first working set weight

exercises.name: Front Squat
exercises.notes: Quad assistance and core stability - keep torso upright

exercises.name: Good Morning
exercises.notes: Posterior chain - light weight, focus on hamstring stretch

exercises.name: Barbell Shrug
exercises.notes: Trap work - squeeze at top, controlled

workouts.name: OHP Day
workouts.focus: Overhead press - shoulders, triceps, upper chest
workouts.warmup: 5 min cardio, shoulder dislocates, band pull aparts, empty bar press, progressive warmup sets
workouts.cooldown: Shoulder stretch, lat stretch, tricep stretch

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.notes: 5/3/1 main work - Week 1: 5/5/5+, Week 2: 3/3/3+, Week 3: 5/3/1+. AMRAP on last set.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.notes: FSL (First Set Last) - 5x5 at first working set weight

exercises.name: Chin-Up
exercises.notes: Back assistance - add weight when bodyweight feels easy

exercises.name: Close-Grip Bench Press
exercises.notes: Tricep assistance for pressing strength

exercises.name: Barbell Curl
exercises.notes: Arm work - strict form, no swinging
